title: Middleware JWT Verification Logic
description: Implement Next.js middleware to intercept requests, parse the JWT, verify signature (RS256), and handle expiration.

title: Tenant Context Injection & Header Management
description: Modify middleware to extract merchant_id and inject into request headers (x-merchant-id).

title: Prisma Middleware for Row-Level Security
description: Implement Prisma extension that automatically filters queries by merchant_id based on context header.

title: QStash Worker Scaffolding & Security
description: Create API route for QStash worker receiver with signature verification.

title: ClickHouse Instance Setup & Connectivity
description: Provision ClickHouse Cloud service and implement TS client connection utility.

title: Design ClickHouse Schema & Engines
description: Define SQL schema for SalesFact and AbandonedCartFact tables using MergeTree engines.

title: Implement ClickHouse Migration Runner
description: Create utility script to apply SQL migrations to ClickHouse instance.

title: Salla API Client with Rate Limiting
description: Implement typed Salla API client with Leaky Bucket rate limiter (Redis) and exponential backoff.

title: Recursive Pagination & Checkpointing Logic
description: Implement core sync logic with recursive QStash triggers to handle long-running imports.

title: Data Transformation & Bulk Upsert
description: Transform Salla JSON to Prisma schema and execute bulk upserts.

title: Dashboard Layout & Skeleton State
description: Create responsive grid layout and skeleton loaders using Tailwind CSS.

title: KPI Card Component Implementation
description: Build reusable KPI card with trend visualization logic.

title: Recharts Integration for Sales Trend
description: Implement main sales trend chart with Recharts AreaChart.

title: Dashboard Data Fetching Integration
description: Wire up UI components to Analytics API using SWR/React Query.

title: Email Scheduling Logic
description: Implement service to calculate send times and push jobs to QStash.

title: Email Sending Worker & Postmark Integration
description: Worker function triggered by QStash to render and send emails via Postmark.

title: Template Rendering Engine
description: Service to interpolate variables into HTML template string securely.
